query:
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.order, p.id as page_id, p.title, p.order as page_order
FROM modules m
LEFT JOIN pages p ON p.moduleId = m.id
WHERE m.name LIKE '%Subtra%'
ORDER BY m.order, p.order;
